codeReview.summary: The feature intent is satisfied: the new MCP docs page documents post-connect registerTool() auto-notification, explains the auth-gated dynamic registration flow, and aligns with source behavior in server/transport and notification tests. I found one minor wording inconsistency in the manual-notification section.

issues.description: The section claims explicit control over when notifications fire for bulk registration, and line 103 implies registration without per-tool notifications, but post-connect registerTool() still auto-notifies each call. The wording is internally contradictory and may mislead readers about suppression behavior.

sharedStateObservations.observation: The docs-worker skill procedure mandates `bun run check`, but mission-level AGENTS guidance marks `bun run check` as a known crashing command and instructs `bun run lint` + `bun run typecheck` instead. This creates a procedure mismatch in this mission context.

summary: Pass with one non-blocking docs clarity note. The implementation delivers the requested documentation for registerTool() post-connect auto-notification and auth-gated dynamic tool registration, and the described behavior is supported by source and tests.
